title: ALARMS SOUND FX PACK 1
description: Alarms Sound FX Pack 1 is a set of digital alarm sounds created to enhance your game and bring the gamer experience to another level.
longDescription:
Alarms Sound FX Pack 1 is a set of digital alarm sounds created to enhance your game and bring the gamer experience to another level.


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/alarmsoundfxpack-demotrack1


Discover:

-      high quality sounds created from award winning synths

-      A wide range of sounds fitting different alarm sizes from small to large to sirens

-      A total of 80+ different alarms

-      75+ Looped alarm sounds at varying speeds

-      80+ Single alarm sounds at varying speeds

-      300 + Sound files that you can import directly into your project

-      35 Bonus Alarms not included in the Sci-Fi UI Sound FX Pack


Find a complete breakdown of the assets list at the following link: http://bit.ly/2Ruwa9BALARMS


Free pack samples here: http://bit.ly/2SB5Ckx


***NOTE: ALARMS SOUND FX PACK 1 IS INCLUDED IN THE SCI-FI UI SOUND PACK WITH THE EXCEPTION OF THE 35 BONUS ALARMS***

Sci-Fi UI Sound Pack: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/sci-fi-ui-sound-pack
technicalDetails:
Total Audio Files: 303

Total Cues: 303

Total Minutes of Audio: 15:00

Format: 44.1 kHz & 16 bit

Does the audio Loop? Some yes and some no

Number of Sound FX: 303

Target Platform: All

Documentation Included: Asset list only (see above)

Important/Additional Notes: No
